verses.roman:
ei jāni' kaṭhina mora hṛdaya śodhite
sārvabhauma kahilena tomāre milite

synonyms: ei jāni'-knowing this; kaṭhina—very hard; mora—My; hṛdaya—heart; śodhite—to rectify; sārvabhauma—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; kahilena—asked; tomāre—you; milite—to meet.
translation: "Knowing this, in order to rectify My heart, which is very hard, Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya asked Me to meet you."
